::Shadow Wing::

"FEATHER WIEGHT BIRDBRAIN?! You four legged walking flea circus!"
She flew after him.  She could tell by the signal that she was 
getting closer to him. She noticed that he was headed north.  She 
smiled. If he thought that he could lose her in the frozen north, he 
was wrong on that count.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> (Ah logo the game is afoot.)
> 
> Lunarpine worked his way north, turned and headed east. there was a 
> slight breeze coming from the west which doubled his advantage. the 
> sun in her eyes, the breeze at her back, he knew that by now she'd 
be 
> after him. "Fuzz Face?"(Come on Logo you can come up with better 
> insults than that.) "Stick it in your audio receptors you feather 
> weight birdbrain." 
> 
> The wolf knew she'd track his comm, he hoped she would.He worked 
his 
> way toward the mountains, there was a series of caves there he 
could 
> use to hide, if nothing else lived there first.
>
